title: Houschka Rounded: new release from G-Type
content:
Nick Cooke's wonderful new Houschka Rounded family is now available, released through his G-Type foundry and distributed by Fontworks UK Ltd.

View the fonts and read the Press Release on Typophile:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/45126](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145517/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45126)

Buy the fonts:  
 [http://www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a\_to\_z&search=houschka+rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145517/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a_to_z&search=houschka+rounded)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Houschka Rounded sample.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145517/http:/typophile.com/files/Houschka%20Rounded%20sample_0.pdf) | 212.82 KB |
author: joe graham _ ty...

comments.content: It is certainly a fun take on the rounded sans genre! I posted it in the news yesterday too! [http://typophile.com/node/45126](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145517/http:/typophile.com/node/45126 "http://typophile.com/node/45126")
